page.title: 13Lothingland School Hobbies
page.content: Hobbies are things that you do in your spare time i.e.time that you have free. I have many hobbies and pastimes some of which include collecting postcards, stamps and raising money for charity. I have got about 800-1000 postcards and about that in stamps. To collect stamps you will have to have tweezers to pick up your stamps with so as not to put finger-prints on them, which could ruin them. You also need an album with squares to stick them in. To stick the stamps in you need stamp hinges. Stamp hinges are little bits of paper bent in half, with one side sticky so that you lick the sticky side and place it on your stamp and at the same time in your album. Also you will need a magnifying glass so that you can read the country it came from originally. For postcards you need photo hinges. By Holly Mullen
